data.text: @thephil1 @Zigmanfreud The only expert you need in this case is your eyes and 30 secs of ideology free thinking

@thephil1 @SenorCampana @Zigmanfreud LoL, cognitive dissonance in you is so obvious
Koreans masked since day 1 but now the case are surging
@Zigmanfreud I think at this point those who believe cloth masks work and vaccines stop spread of asymptomatic transmission are going to be that way forever.

@grantstern Only a complete imbecile, and I mean that sincerely, could possibly buy the absolutely ludicrous and totally unfounded fantasy that somehow “Omicron” renders previously useful masks powerless.

What REALLY happened is that Asian countries didn’t have built up immunity to Omicron.

@Zigmanfreud Showing that chart doesn't disprove masks slowing or stopping the spread. I'm no scientist, but to me, it just looks like masks and whatever combined countermeasures South Korea uses aren't as effective against Omicron as they may have been in other waves.

@grantstern Grant, the point of masks is to stop/slow spread. This shows once again they don’t work. Also, we were told by you people that the vaccines would stop transmission, and this once again proves that was a lie. 

I’m sorry this is so difficult for you who are invested in fairytales.
@grantstern @Zigmanfreud Wow, you really know how to miss a point, don't you?
@thephil1 @Zigmanfreud Just because you think you're too stupid to interpret numbers simply because you don't have a science degree, doesn't mean everybody is as big a M0R0N as you!
